attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson has brought us through brexit and covid which before this noone knew nothing about,his done a brilliant Job on the covid jabs and has been stabbed in the back by fellow members
attributes.background: Keep boris johnson as prime minister

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes petitions making requests about the appointment of a new Prime Minister.

In any case, decisions about the election of a new leader of the Conservative Party are a matter for that party, not the UK Government or Parliament.
